info.name: PMMP Doxygen Flat Theme (Dark & Light)
info.description:
Gives the auto-generated PocketMine documentation a fresh new look.
Screenshots: Imgur

This has only been tested with Google Chrome.

Encoutering problems?
Contact me either via a private conversation on PMMP forums or using one of the methods in the contact section on my profile.
info.additionalInfo:
This is the second release. Changelog:
  • Fixed for the newest doxygen version
  • Changed search loading animation

options.label: Dark (recommended)
